data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core LJUNGSJ, Ljungsjön, Sweden
Location: 2.5 km north of Trärred. Core diameter: 10 cm. Site description: Bog pool. Physiography: upland plateau with low relief. Surrounding vegetation: mire, pine and spruce forests.
New 14C dates from Hurneberg supporting the revised deglaciation chronology of the Middle Swedish and moraine zone
